response.overview: The story is about Bhaskara Rao (Ramesh Bhat), a rich industrialist, and his wife Sharada (Padmaja Rao). They want a baby boy as he thinks he can save money and also earn cash through dowry. They abandon the first baby in the hospital as it turns out to be a girl. When a son is born, they give him a lot of attention grows up, he forces his father to sell his property, leaving them with no support.
response.title: Gharbada Gudi
